abstract: Breakout performances by Royalty Hightower in movie The Fits, Michael Barbieri in Little Men, Parker Sawyers in Southside With You and Sarah Gadon in Indignation noted.

headline.print_headline: Giving Off a Lot of Heat
headline.main: Breakthrough Performances From the Summer Movies Season

snippet: Playing a dancer, a Brooklynite, a future president or a college student, these actors shine in new films.
lead_paragraph: Playing a dancer, a Brooklynite, a future president or a college student, these actors shine in new films.
